title: Can't Login (Unable to Connect to Login Queue)
body: When i login it Authenticates for a while than wont connect to the server login queue

replies.body: This is happening everywhere? Wow, this is massive
Yeah, quite a few players seem to have been impacted by the login issues last night.  Everything should be squared away now, so get in there and play some games! :D
any update when this error would be fixed ?
Yeah same here last night it was working fine but today not so much. Tried reinstalling client and flushing the dns but none of those have helped me so far...Rito plz {{champion:141}}
Me too, says unable to connect to the login queue.
